sentences.sContent: The adult characters seemed too crudely drawn; the hopes and dreams of the fathers – and one assumes, the mothers – too easily dismissed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The adult characters seemed too crudely drawn; the hopes and dreams of the fathers – and one assumes, the mothers – too easily dismissed.
sentences.sCn: 成年人的角色塑造的太过粗糙，父亲们抑或是母亲们的希望和梦想太过轻易地被排斥。

synos.tran: 粗糙地；天然地；粗鲁地；不成熟地

words.tran: 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的
天然的状态；生硬；未成熟
